name: Darksiders III: The Crucible
description: The Crucible is a battle arena offering up wave-based combat and special challenges. Similar to the DLC of the same name from Darksiders II, you’ll need to fight your way through 100 waves of increasingly difficult enemy encounters to reach the end. Along the way, you’ll be able to take on five all new boss challenges and be able to earn some new armor sets and four new weapon enhancements. There are also six new achievements/trophies to be found.
